data.message: I want a parade for straight people now please

replies.message: David..if we had one we would be arrested for illegal gathering.....our rights are GONE!!!z
clear this up for me please, what rights have been taken away from you?
We have all our rights. Also, the parade is for equality for everyone, plenty of heterosexual people march in the parades.
They need to add to the abbrieviaton again lol

1 - are you beaten for being straight? no? then you don't get one.
2 - are you killed in other countries for being straight? no? then you don't get one.
3 - are you abandoned by your family for being straight? no? then you don't get one.
4 - can you lose your job for being straight? no? then you don't get one.
5 - YOU DON"T GET ONE!!!
I am not gay but I walk in support of all humans who ALL DESERVE the same Rights I was given at birth!!
Go park in a Walmart parking lot and have a ball there, David!  There is your hetero pride parade, and it happens daily too....
Actually literally you would not be arrested for illegal gathering, you have the same first amendment rights LGBT people do, stop complaining about nothing
Right, Barbara Waters Griffin, what rights have you lost.  The right to not be called on being a bigot?  Bigot.

Sure, you can have one, get your permits (the pride parade has to have permits). Post your flyers and pay for the security (the Pride organizers pay off- duty police to provide security). and you can have a straight pride parade. Do the work, or whine more, it's up to you.
well go do one then   jeez  the gays do it for themselves they don't ask straight people to do it for them
Looks like haters STILL gonna HATE!
I believe that when you have the right to get married you don't get to have a parade.
like this page for more fun <3 <3 <3 https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?v=3381332109536&set=vb.485698471506159&type=2&theater
I'm straight, and the reason we don't have a Pride Parade is because we haven't been oppressed and discriminated against.
